title: Kechara Oasis - Petaling Jaya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Delivery, Take-out, Malaysian, Southeast Asian
description: New Age Vegetarian Cuisine, Kechara Oasis provides modern vegetarian cuisine in a fine dining atmosphere. Offers a la carte menu. Vegans to specify. Caters banquets and functions. Dim sum is offered at their Kuala Lumpur restaurant but not at this location. Kitchen breaks from 3-6pm.
streetAddress: Unit 19-LG1, Level B1, Block D Jaya One
